mapper.select: select news_id ,news_title ,news_abstract ,news_content ,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time ,news_type from news where news_id = #{news_id}
SELECT a.competition_id from user_competition a WHERE a.user_id =#{user_id}
select a.club_id from user_detail a where a.user_id =#{user_id}

select a.news_id ,a.news_type ,a.news_title ,a.news_abstract ,a.create_time ,b.media_information as file_id ,c.category_id as channel_id ,d.category_name as channel_name ,d.category_describe as channel_describe ,concat("HEAD",coalesce(b.media_url,'')) as preview_image ,concat("HEAD",coalesce(d.category_image,'')) as channel_image from news a left join news_multimedia b on a.news_id = b.news_id and b.is_delete = 0 and b.media_index = 0
left join news_category_relation c on a.news_id = c.news_id and c.is_delete = 0
left join news_category d on c.category_id = d.category_id
where a.news_id = #{news_id}
